product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Tri-Leg Stool - Special Buy
long_description: Lightweight and compact to take with you on camping adventures, the ALPS Mountaineering Tri-Leg Stool makes it easy to snag a great spot by the fire. Heavy-duty polyester seat and steel legs provide comfortable support; plastic feet help prevent tipping. Adjustable shoulder strap allows convenient over-the-shoulder carrying. Stool folds up and stays closed with a rip-and-stick strap for convenient packing. Includes a stuff sack for storage. Special buy.
short_description: Lightweight and compact to take with you on camping adventures, the ALPS Mountaineering Tri-Leg Stool makes it easy to snag a great spot by the fire.
